price: 84.digaalah xeet Robti innah keenil (Luut marak koroosite mara kinnuk) oobisne, Nabii Mucammadow ﷺ umeyniitik ellecabo kah tekke inna wagitey kaak iyye Yalli.
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muj'rimīna
